WelcomeToInfibridgeMsg: Infibridge wallet is your gateway to Celo blockchain. Manage your accounts, send money in Celo or stable coins like cUSD and cEUR, participate in governance and more.
ToSMsg: I confirm that I have read and agree to the
ToSErrorMsg: You must agree to the terms of use.
SelectBlockchainMsg: Select the Blockchain for which you would like to create or import a wallet.
ImportSeedMsg: Create wallet from a seed phrase
ImportPvtKeyMsg: Create wallet from a private key
ImportKeystoreMsg: Create wallet from a Keystore file
InvalidKeystoreFileOrPassword: Invalid Keystore file or wrong password.
CreateNewSeedMsg: Create wallet with new seed phrase
Name: Name
PasswordError: Password must be at least 8 characters.
ConfirmPasswordError: Password and confirm password do not match.
PrivateKeyPrompt: Please enter your wallet password to view the private key of this account.
PrivateKeyNotice: Never share your private key. Anyone who has access to the private key can steal all the funds from this account.
WalletNameError: Please enter a name for the wallet (3 to 15 characters).
WalletReadyMsg: Congratulations! Your wallet is ready to use. Some tips to manage your wallet:
WalletTip1: Remember not to share the seed phrase or private keys with anyone.
WalletTip2: Backup the seed phrase / private key in a safe place.
WalletTip3: To view and backup the seed phrase again, go to Menu > My Wallets
PhishingAlertMsg: Infibridge NEVER asks you for the seed phrase unless you are manually importing a wallet.
MakeBackupSubTitle: Make a backup of the seed phrase in the exact words sequence shown.
MakeBackupMsg1: You will need the seed phrase to restore your accounts later OR if you forget your password. Your funds will be lost forever if you forget the seed phrase.
MakeBackupMsg2: Wallet accounts are generated using the seed phrase. Please make a backup of it in the same sequence shown and store it in a secure location like a password manager. You can also print it on paper and keep the paper in a safe deposit box.
MakeBackupMsg3: Never share the seed phrase with anyone. Anyone who has access to the phrase can take funds from the accounts generated using it.
ImportSeedErrorMsg: Please enter a valid, 24 words seed phrase.
PasteOrTypeSeedPhrase: Paste or type seed phrase here
PrivateKeyErrorMsg: Please enter a valid private key.
SecureWalletMsg: Set a name and password for this wallet. You can create multiple wallets with a unique password for each wallet.
ReceiveMsg: View address to recieve funds in this account
WalletIsUnlocked: This wallet is unlocked. Logout to lock the wallet.
DeleteWalletMsg: Sure you wish to delete this wallet? This action cannot be undone.
WalletPasswordMsg: Enter wallet password to change the wallet name.
EnterPwdToDeleteMsg: Enter wallet password to confirm delete.
EnterPwdToSaveMsg: Enter wallet password to save changes.
PasteAddressHere: Paste the address that you wish to watch (with the leading 0x).
EarnSub: Earn rewards by staking your funds with validators.
VoteSub: Participate in Celo by voting for governance proposals.
